Pgmnorm User Manual(0)                   Pgmnorm User Manual(0)





NAME
       pgmnorm - replaced by pnmnorm

DESCRIPTION
       This program is part of Netpbm(1).

       pgmnorm was replaced in Netpbm 9.25 (March 2002) by pnm-
       norm(1).

       pnmnorm is backward compatible with pgmnorm, but it also
       handles PPM images.



netpbm documentation       March 2002    Pgmnorm User Manual(0)
